body:
Hi Chris,
You need to add -m 2 to your genskyvec command.  The -m argument in genskyvec should agree with -e MF:  setting in the rtcontrib command that creates the daylight matrix.
Andy


On Apr 22, 2010, at 10:49 AM, Chris Humann wrote:


-------------- next part --------------
